page.title: 02HOUSING IN THE DON VALLEY
page.content: Our area includes the Hyde-Park & Park Hill development which became famous in the post-war period. These two enormous blocks of{flats}contain 2,317 dwellings with shops, schools and high level streets. Many of the older{terraced houses}in the area are being pulled down and replaced with low-level family houses and parkland.Large tracts of land stand derelict awaiting{council {decisions}on the future. Most of the houses in Attercliffe & Darnall are Corporation owned though a few private estates, such as the Littledale estate, cater for those wanting a modestly priced semi- detatched home. Terraced rows of poor quality houses are gradually being replaced by{modern estates}of mixed homes.
